title: Marseille vs Paris Saint-Germain, Barcelona vs Real Madrid, Juventus vs Inter Milan, Boca Juniors vs River Plate and other ‘Clasico’ clashes from around world
text:
EFL top of the class Marseille vs Paris Saint-Germain, Barcelona vs Real Madrid, Juventus vs Inter Milan, Boca Juniors vs River Plate and other ‘Clasico’ clashes from around world 
As we build up to biggest match in French football at Velodrome, we take a look at similar rivalries around the globe By ANDREW RICHARDSON
